name: Icecold-kernel (work in progress)
body:
# Hello and welcome

## Some informations about this kernel project
This kernel is based on googles 3.0.31 android kernel.
All the needed modifactions for the P500 (e.g. drivers) are ported from LGE 2.6.35 kernel.

## What works
Nothing!
For the moment there are lot of compilation errors needed to be fixed and drivers to port.

## Tested ROMs
none

## Warning
I'm not responsible if you brick your device by heavy OC, flashing, ...
Using using very high frequencies (> 729Mhz) is dangerous and can melt your phone main board!
Always take care what you do.

## Downloads
none

# FAQs:
## When will you release this kernel?
I don't know.

# Changelogs
## vx.x Changelog
none
* _**initial version**_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
